caption.p: Nanotechnologies utilized in nanomedicine vaccines. Ag (antigen); Ab (antibody); APC (antigen presenting cell); IgG (serum immunoglobulin G); AFC (antibody forming cell); ADCC (antibody-dependent cytotoxic cell); Tc (cytotoxic T-cell); GC (granulocyte); Th (helper T-cell); MAC (macrophage); MC (memory cell); NKC (natural killer cell). Reproduced with permission from [ 24], (CC BY).
